items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based network scanner that detects local devices, identifies open ports, and highlights security vulnerabilities. Features an intuitive UI with real-time scanning updates, customizable IP/port ranges, and detailed device information to help secure your network infrastructure.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
